overview: The 1992 Australian Cast Concert Tour of Jesus Christ Superstar was a phenomenal success with fans of stage and the artists involved. To date, the only keepsake fans have had of this production is the Official Cast Recording CD which at the time, debut at #1 and remained at #1 for 10 weeks (4Ã— Platinum). It also went on to be awarded 'Highest Selling Album' at the 1993 ARIA Awards.
title: Jesus Christ Superstar
